text: Tsey khto vmyrayutʹ ta lyshayutʹ zhinok, bude bude zabezpechyty yikhnikh zhinok z pidtrymkoyu protyahom roku, yakshcho vony zalyshayutʹsya v mezhakh toho zhe hospodarstva. Yakshcho vony lyshayutʹ, vy ne zdiysnyuyete hrikh dozvolyayuchy yim shchob ni vony bazhayutʹ, stilʹky, skilʹky righteousness pidtrymuyetʹsya. BOH ye Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
